analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xcf862bd5f69c791610ce0e4210185a8db5ffc51b.sol:
	Contract PotbelleezToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xcf862bd5f69c791610ce0e4210185a8db5ffc51b.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xcf862bd5f69c791610ce0e4210185a8db5ffc51b.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
